text: The 1st District of the Alabama Senate is currently represented by Tim Melson (Republican). ==Communities== The district includes portions of Lauderdale, Limestone, and Madison counties. Communities contained at least partially within the district include the following: ===Cities=== *Athens *Florence *Huntsville ===Towns=== *Anderson *Ardmore *Elkmont *Killen *Lester *Lexington *Rogersville *St. Florian ===Unincorporated places=== *Meridianville *Underwood-Petersville ==References== Category:Alabama Senate districts
title: Alabama Senate, District 1
